{{Disambiguation}}
'''Skeleton''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==

=== Mobs ===
* {{EntityLink|Skeleton}}, a hostile mob, which shoots [[Arrow|arrows]] with a [[bow]].
* {{EntityLink|Wither skeleton}}, a tall skeleton variant that attacks with a stone sword, inflicting the [[Wither (effect)|Wither]] effect.
* {{EntityLink|Stray}}, a skeleton variant that uses arrows of [[Slowness]].
* {{EntityLink|Bogged}}, a skeleton variant that uses arrows of [[Poison]].
* {{EntityLink|Parched}}, a skeleton variant that uses arrows of [[Weakness]].
* {{EntityLink|Skeleton Horse}}, a skeleton variation of the [[horse]].
* {{EntityLink|Spider jockey}}, a skeleton, stray, or wither skeleton riding a [[spider]].
* {{EntityLink|Skeleton horseman}}, a skeleton riding a skeleton horse.
* {{EntityLink|Wither}}, an undead skeleton-like boss that fires [[Wither#Wither Skull|wither skulls]].

=== Blocks ===
* {{BlockLink|Skeleton skull}}, a block that is obtained from a skeleton killed by a charged creeper, but can generate naturally in an [[ancient city]].
* {{BlockLink|Wither skeleton skull}}, a block that is rarely obtained from defeating a wither skeleton.

=== Structures ===
* {{EnvLink|Fossil}}, an Overworld structure that consists of [[bone block]]s and [[coal ore]] or [[diamond ore]].
* {{EnvLink|Nether Fossil}}, a Nether structure that consists of [[bone block]]s.

=== Tutorials ===
* [[Tutorial:Skeleton horse farming|Skeleton horse farming]]

=== Downloadable Content ===
*[[Image:MCSMSkeletonFace.png|15px]] [[Minecon 2018 New Entity Sample#Additions|Skeletaur]], a hybrid of [[Skeleton]] and [[Skeleton Horse]] in [[Minecon 2018 New Entity Sample]]
=== Joke Mobs ===
* {{EntityLink|Pink Wither}}, a passive version of the Wither on [[April Fools' Day#2013|April Fools' Day 2013]] and [[April Fools' Day#2015|April Fools' Day 2015]].

== ''Minecraft: Story Mode'' ==
*{{SMEntityLink|Skeleton}}, a ranged hostile mob.
*{{SMEntityLink|Stray}}, a skeleton variant that shoots slowness tipped arrows.

== ''Minecraft Dungeons'' ==
* {{DuEntityLink|Skeleton}}, a hostile mob armed with a bow
* {{DuEntityLink|Barrage}}, an ancient skeleton.
* {{DuEntityLink|Stray}}, an ice covered skeleton that fires arrows that can slow down the hero
* {{DuEntityLink|Mossy Skeleton}}, a moss covered skeleton that fires poison arrows
* {{DuEntityLink|Wither Skeleton}}, a coal covered skeleton that attacks with a sword and gives the wither effect
* {{DuEntityLink|Wither Skeleton Archer}}, a ranged wither skeleton variant that uses the Red Snake to shoot wither arrows
* {{DuEntityLink|Sunken Skeleton}}, a coral and lichen covered skeleton that attacks with a crossbow instead of a bow.
* {{DuEntityLink|Vanguard}}, a melee variant of skeleton wielding a glaive and shield
* {{DuEntityLink|Cursed Presence}}, an ancient vanguard.
* {{DuEntityLink|Skeleton Horseman}}, a powerful mob consisting of an armored skeleton with a longbow riding a skeleton horse
* {{DuEntityLink|Skeleton Horse}}, a hostile mob that is ridden by skeleton horsemen,
* {{DuEntityLink|Necromancer}}, a skeleton which can summon undead mobs as well as shooting projectiles with their staff
* {{DuEntityLink|Haunted Caller}}, an ancient necromancer.
* {{DuEntityLink|Nameless One}}, boss mob in the desert temple mission that shares some behavior with necromancers
* {{DuEntityLink|False King}}, a clone of the nameless one that is summoned by the nameless one.
